main event: On 17 September 1956, three civilians observed an unidentified flying object over New Castle, Delaware.
interesting points: The object was described variably as cigar-shaped, star-like with jagged edges, and circular with projections., It was reported to be very bright and silver or white in color., Observers estimated its size to vary between a half dollar and a grapefruit., All witnesses described the object as disappearing suddenly in a burst of speed., An electrical storm was present in the area at the time of the sighting.
witnesses: three civilians including a paper delivery boy, a newspaper reporter, and a housewife
